name: cs-portfolio
description: Full-stack portfolio project with Next.js frontend and Node.js backend

scripts.build: npm run server:build && npm run client:build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd cs_portfolio_server && npm install && cd ../cs_portfolio_client && npm install
scripts.clean: cd cs_portfolio_server && rm -rf node_modules dist && cd ../cs_portfolio_client && rm -rf node_modules .next

author: Christian Sheen
